name: Shadow Spirit (UA)
languages: Common, understands the languages you speak

trait.name: Hit Points
text: equal the shadow's Constitution modifier + your spellcasting ability modifier + ten times the spell's level

trait.name: Bloodthirsty Frenzy (Fury Only)
text: The spirit has advantage on attack rolls against frightened creatures.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth (Fear Only)
text: While in dim light or darkness, the spirit can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Weight of Ages (Despair Only)
text: Any beast or humanoid, other than you, that starts its turn within 5 feet of the spirit has its speed reduced by 20 feet until the start of that beast or humanoid's next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Chilling Rend
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 + the spell's level to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2d8 + 3 + the spell's level cold damage.

action.name: Dreadful Scream (1/Day)
text: The spirit screams. Each creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or be frightened of the spirit for 1 minute. The frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

description: Source: Unearthed Arcana: 2020 Spells And Magic Tattoos p. 7
